stories.text: Is it conceivable in the near future that Starlink may become a mobile ISP? What advances in hardware are required to do away with cell towers?
stories.title: Ask HN: Starlink for Mobile?

stories.text:
Hi HN,

It's taking more time than we planned to raise and my savings are starting to decrease.

My background is in portfolio management and software engineering (data science/data infrastructure).

I'm wondering what resources I should be using to find freelance work/part-time work to pay the bills.

So far, I've done a few things on Upwork, but there's not enough fitting jobs to make good money. I've also done the whole process of Toptal but was told (at the end, great!) that there is no portfolio management jobs on the platform...

Where can I find part-time employment/freelance jobs in portfolio management/data science/data infrastructure these days?
stories.title: Ask HN: Side/Freelance Work
